page.title: 20HACKLINGE AREA PLACE NAMES
page.content:
Among place names of interest are: Hacklinge - Hollow Dwellers Finglesham - Settlement of a Princess Marley - Clearing beside a Pool Igguldene - In the Corner Howe - Spur of Land Ham - Low-lying Marshland Betteshanger is derived from o/e gebylles-hangra through six changes to its present name.
SURVEY RESEARCH The survey was undertaken by members of Word-in-Worth Women's Institute Anne Goldsack Janet Bradley Joan Dallen Pam Pavitt Kathleen Goodger Margaret Coombey Heather Burley Pam West Barbara Barber Sandra Kingsland
